content: are you rasta ready you will be once you crank out a few pairs of these super fast super fun finger-less mitts i gift them to my dog groomer my hairdresser yoga instructor etc they make a fabulous quick gift that you will whip up on a us 15 dpn one 90 yd skein of rasta yields 3 1/2 mitts not pairs mitts so buy 2 skeins and that will give you a total of 3 pairs yay or you can make one pair of mitts and one pair of wrist warmers from one skein co 16 sts knit in the round for 20 rnds and bobble voila either way malabrigo yarns are stunning their colors are scrumptious and a joy to work with materials 1 skein malabrigo rasta us dpn 15 markers stitch holder i like the little ones so they dont get in my way large tapestry needle size fits an average womans hand enjoy let me know how you like the pattern and please post a pic on instagram #knitwithme enjoy
